labyrinth

Class Direction

  • java.lang.Object
    • labyrinth.Direction

  • public class Direction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents direction in two-dimensional system. Is implemented as a unit vector with two coordinates.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Direction(com.googlecode.lanterna.input.Key key)
      Create direction from keyboard button
